ThingDef.label: Zoom
ThingDef.description: Go-Juice distilled into a fine crystalline substance. Because the active ingredients have been isolated, zoom can be smoked to receive a far greater sense of euphoria as well as enhancement to performance relative to an average hit of go-juice. Like pressing an active belt sander into your frontal lobe, taking zoom comes at the cost of grave side-effects - including a greatly increased risk of overdose and addiction. As a result, zoom is well known for destroying lives, communities, and entire societies.

HediffDef.label: Blitzing on zoom!
HediffDef.description: Zoom in the bloodstream. It enhances combat-related abilities to a superhuman level, but is fiendishly addictive and deals a heavy cost to the brain. Most with the resources to do so will simply smoke more zoom to escape the inevitable crash, but the risk of mental breakdown is far more difficult to escape.
